Class LinkFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.LinkFactory

public class LinkFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing methods to create specific types of links.

createRealizationLink

public static RealizationLink createRealizationLink(DeployModelObject source,
                                                    DeployModelObject target)
Create a realization link from a conceptual Unit, Capability, or Requirement to a target. The source must be a conceptual Unit or must be contained in one.

The link is created in the context (Topology) of the source.

Parameters:
source - the source Unit, Capability, or Requirement
target - the target Unit, Capability, or Requirement
Returns:
the realization link

createRealizationLink

public static RealizationLink createRealizationLink(DeployModelObject source,
                                                    DeployModelObject target,
                                                    AbstractLinkDescriptorFactory factory)
Create a realization link from a conceptual Unit, Capability, or Requirement to a target. The source must be a conceptual Unit or must be contained in one.

The link is created in the context (Topology) of the source.

Parameters:
source - the source Unit, Capability, or Requirement
target - the target Unit, Capability, or Requirement
factory - factory to create link descriptors
Returns:
the realization link
